DOC.brief_title: Brain Peripheral Electrical Stimulation Chronic Low Back Pain : Factorial Design
DOC.criteria: Males female age > 18 year < 65 year Complaining back pain three month Presence chronic pain measurable number rating scale ( NRS 010 ) less 4 1 week daily NRS monitoring Seeking care low back pain Previous surgery spine , spondylolisthesis Previous treatment TENS < 6 month Previous treatment tDCS Disc herniation nerve compression Neurological , psychiatric rheumatologic disease Impaired sensibility Use pacemaker implant device Pregnancy
